channel.title: Internet Pet Peeves
channel.description:
When ppl tyep laik dis 4 no reson eevntho tye undrstand english well ennugh not 2 tyep laik dis. When people act stupid. When people troll for no reason, and it isn't funny. When people are ignorant. When some kid reports me for 'insulting' him.
Lots more, that's all I could think of at the moment.
Post yours.

When people post shit that causes my mind to melt before locking.
